benchmark_details.name: Easy Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: Easy Dataset is a unified framework for synthesizing fine-tuning datasets from unstructured documents using an intuitive graphical user interface (GUI), enabling human-in-the-loop interaction to ensure data quality.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective of Easy Dataset is to automate the synthesis of high-quality fine-tuning datasets from unstructured documents while minimizing manual effort.

data.source: Generated from unstructured documents using adaptive document processing and persona-driven data synthesis.
data.annotation: Human-in-the-loop refinement by users to ensure quality.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on model performance on domain-specific and general-purpose benchmarks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better model performance in domain adaptation and preservation of general knowledge.
methodology.validation: Evaluated on general-purpose benchmarks including MMLU, CMMLU, HellaSwag, MATH, and HumanEval.
